title: Eschatovouni
text: Eschatovouni (Greek: Εσχατοβούνι, meaning "nethermost <a href="mountain">mountain</a>") is a <a href="List%20of%20neighbourhoods%20in%20Patras">neighbourhood</a> in the northeastern part of the city of <a href="Patras">Patras</a>. It is the final hill of <a href="Dasylio%2C%20Patras">Dasylio</a> in which it takes the name Eschatovouni. This neighborhood is near the neighborhood of <a href="Gouva">Gouva</a>.
